Demographics

Last Updated: 6/28/2020

Occurence indicates whether the question is currently included in either the baseline or the follow-up survey.

Question Source Occurrence
What is the zip code for your current residence? Current
What state do you live in? Current
What are the living arrangements for children in your household under the age of 5? Parents are not limited to biological parents, but include stepparents and those who adopt their children. Foster parents are considered nonrelatives. • Two parents
• Mother, no father
• Father, no mother
• Neither parent in household
• Other relatives
• Non-relatives 		Current
What best describes your relationship status? • Engaged • Married • Separated • Divorced • Widowed • Living together/cohabitating • Romantically involved, but living apart
• Not in any kind of relationship (Single)
• Other 		Past
How would you describe your household structure?
• Single parent • Two parent household • Extended family household 		Past
How many total children do you have? Current
How many children do you have in each age group? Select all that apply. • 0-3 • 4-5 • 6 -8
• 9 - 11 • 12 - 18 • 19 - 25 • 26 - 55 • 56 - 64 • 65+ 		Current
How many people currently live in your home? Current
What gender do you identify with? • Male • Female • Transgender Female • Transgender Male • Gender variant/Non-Conforming • Prefer not to answer
• Other [text entry] 		Past
What gender do you identify with? • Male • Female • Other [text entry] • Do not wish to disclose Current
Where were you born? • Inside the United States • Outside the United States Current
What generation do you identify with? • First Generation - You were born outside the United States • Second Generation - You were born in the United States to immigrant parents
• Third Generation - You were born in the United States to U.S. born parents
• Fourth Generation or Greater - Parents and grandparents were born in the U.S.
• Unknown or unsure 		Current
Are you of Hispanic, Latinx, or Spanish origin? • No, not of Hispanic, Latinx, or Spanish origin
• Yes, Mexican, Mexican American, or Central American (Guatemalan, Salvadoran)
• Yes, Puerto Rican, Cuban, Colombian, Ecuadorian, other Hispanic or Latinx 		Current
What is your race? Select all that apply • American Indian/ Alaska Native
• Asian • Black / African American
• Native Hawaiian/ Pacific Islander
• White/ Caucasian
• Other [text entry] 		Current
What is your ethnicity? • Hispanic/ Latinx
• not Hispanic/ Latinx 		Current
What language is primarily spoken in your home? • English • Arabic • Chinese • French • German • Italian • Japanese • Korean • Russian • Spanish • Vietnamese • Other Current
Which other language is spoken in your home? • [text entry] Current
Are you currently pregnant? • Yes • No • Unsure • Not applicable Current
Approximately how many weeks along are you? • 0 • 10 • 20 • 30 • 40 • 50 Past
Does your child have any of the following disabilities? • Blind or serious difficulty seeing even when wearing glasses • Serious difficulty walking or climbing stairs • Due to a physical, mental, or emotional problem, difficulty remembering, concentrating, or making decisions • Other disabilities • No disabilities • Do not wish to disclose Current
